description: Gạch giao dịch thu tiền BIDV
body: SELECT *, 'EXEC dbo.sp_POSBank_BIDV_ClearPendingSaleOrders @Data = N''<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><BIDVTransationSaleOrdersRequestModel xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><bankCode>BIDV</bankCode><bankCertifiedKey>jR2f56wW3M5QLaIslTGigxQeRUdzBpwcpssEyCsXSm2/sJbawHkGBAa8J5gd1zI+</bankCertifiedKey><BIDVTransationSaleOrders><DATA><transationID>12200813_20180822151459</transationID><transationStatus>OK</transationStatus><TID>12200813</TID><transtionType>' + transtionType + '</transtionType><saleOrderCode>' + saleOrderCode + '</saleOrderCode><creditCardNumber>9704 XXXX XXXX 6127</creditCardNumber><cardHolderName>GIAO DICH TEST</cardHolderName><authorizationCode>TEST</authorizationCode><totalAmount>' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, totalAmount) +  '</totalAmount></DATA></BIDVTransationSaleOrders></BIDVTransationSaleOrdersRequestModel>''' FROM dbo.FRT_POSBank_BIDV_PendingSaleOrders_Push (NOLOCK)
